title: Memorandum of Understanding between the Bandaranaike International Diplomatic Training Institute and the Levan Mikeladze Diplomatic Training and Research Institute of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Georgia
decision_details: - It has been proposed to sign a Memorandum of Understanding between the Bandaranaike International Diplomatic Training Institute coming under the purview of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the Levan Mikeladze Diplomatic Training and Research Institute of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Georgia to establish cooperation pertaining to sharing of expertise, exchange of academic staff, exchange of students, joint research programmes as well as sharing of teaching methodologies and other relevant areas. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Minister of Foreign Affairs to sign the said proposed Memorandum of Understanding between the two parties in parallel with the 25th anniversary celebrations of the establishment of diplomatic relations between two countries, was approved by the Cabinet.
